comment:
Rishi bhai The philospher. Most humble and polite person I met. Wese jitne sharif dikhte ho utne ho nhi. We had the best talks together. Tumse bada chai lover shayad hi koi hoga.

Project me Rishi bhai saath ho toh koi tension nhi, Thode bhot dhoke aur negativity toh chalti hi h. All the best for the future bhaiğŸ˜Š.

comment: Very humble and knowledgable person. Free time m chess khelta h, kabhi time waste nhi krta , har pal ka sampoorn upyog krta h bro. Projects m saath kaam krke bahut mja aaya(iykyk)ğŸ™‚. Movie to koi n koi chalti rhti h. All the Best aur jaldi milte h..

comment: The most OP adjudicator, and the best mentorship head Debsoc ever had. So dedicated to it that has 2 tenures under his belt, your passion is commendable. Also I love the way you are calm and sweet but can totally roast people calmly. All the best, you're the most positive person ik. Keep rocking.

comment: Rishi bhaiyaaa! Will miss the late night walks and talks, be it the hanging out in Night Canteen, or the late night work for Executive Board, or the high pressure work for the Chief Guest (iykyk) or the gyaan sessions of DebSoc. Will definitely miss seeing you around! Wish you all the best!!

comment: The most creative and mature person I have ever met. One of the most interesting guy with ability to understand both sides of each and every coin. Online projects were fun and even more fun was randomly meeting and gossiping in Night Canteen. Keep enlightening with your perspectives, Rishi
name: Nilay Ganvit

comment: A guy with a whole different perspective. The most understanding individual and the DebSoc Head. His sleep cycles are a little different, but he manages to handle everything. Best of luck with your future endeavours!!
